sentences: Ivo Perelman (born January 12, 1961) is a Brazilian free jazz saxophonist born in São Paulo.
He attended the Berklee College of Music for one semester and then dropped out, moving to Los Angeles in 1986.
Perelman released his first album in 1989, which featured Peter Erskine, John Patitucci, Airto Moreira, Eliane Elias, and Flora Purim as guests.
After the release of his first album he moved to New York City.
